mapper.select: SELECT delivery_Idx AS deliveryIdx, user_Idx AS userIdx, delivery_Name AS deliveryName, Receiver AS Receiver, delivery_Phone AS deliveryPhone, address AS address, Extra_Address AS extraAddress, Zipcode AS zipcode, is_Default_Address AS isDefaultAddress FROM Delivery WHERE user_Idx = #{userIdx} ORDER BY is_Default_Address DESC, delivery_Idx DESC
